message: Let's start fair. I propose 60 for me and 40 for you.  What do you think?
Your offer was a bit too greedy for me. I'm proposing we split it 70/30. Take it or leave it, the deal will be worse for you in the next round.
I understand your position, Bob. I'm willing to concede a bit more, but 40/60 is my final offer. If we go to the next round, I'm sure we'll both lose more money. Let's end this now.
